# My first cool idea {#slug-one}

Author: Kenneth Chen

#### Machine learning, sentient algorithms

A sentient robot

## A beginning.

If and only if could machine understand what we think ... we always wonder. What about other people's mind? We can only conjecture what other people thinks in their minds. That their physical sense, any kind of being sentient can be mutually understood can only be extrapolated from one's own experience. There was never a visceral experience that can be gained from somebody else sentiment. There was only an understanding that is a derivative.
